lines.text: Maybe the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> melted just like those candles...
...and then tried to reconstitute himself, but froze in place...
...but that wouldn't explain him turning gray and rocky. Never mind that, then.
Wh- hold it, that's the reason you're ditchin' that idea?!
Because the guy meltin' and then unmeltin' was plausible, 'cept for that one little detail?
Yeah, Leo. I'm like, logic central over here.
